title: Trump Media seeks SEC approval for bitcoin and ethereum ETF
summary: Trump Media sought SEC approval to launch an exchange-traded fund that will invest in bitcoin and ethereum, marking the firm’s second cryptocurrency ETF filing
description: Trump Media sought SEC approval to launch an exchange-traded fund that will invest in bitcoin and ethereum, marking the firm’s second cryptocurrency ETF filing
